gold_coin_desc: A currency used when buying gifts, cars, avatar frames, and playing games in the app
how_to_recharge_desc: You need to set up at least one acceptable payment method with your Apple ID or Google account before you can recharge.
use_method: You can typically use these payment methods:
recharge_no_success: 3、What should I do if my recharge is not successful but my money is deducted?
recharge_no_success_desc_1: If this happens,you can reopen the app and go to "Me-Recharge & Income"to check your gold coin balance again.
recharge_no_success_desc_2: If still don’t get coins,contact us at  wenext.wyak@gmail.com and feedback your ID、time、screenshot of your emil receipt 、bank statement/confirmation SMS messages or the invoice from your purchase history on Apple Store
recharge_no_success_desc_3: When the transaction is confirmed,we will add the amount of coins you bought to your account immediately.
what_is_diamond_desc: A currency you can get when you receive a gift:
diamond_desc_1: 1) For everyone: show your own popularity, and can be exchanged for gold coins to buy goods in the app
diamond_desc_2: 2) To the anchor: the more diamonds you get, the more salary you will get
